page.title: 03LEISURE ACTIVITIES-Newtown
page.content: LEISURE ACTIVITIES OF SOME OF THE PEOPLE OF NEWTOWN, GT.YARMOUTH We decided that the results showed that most people do not want any more entertainment in Newtown. Also,a majority said they do not spend too much on Entertainment.Nearly all travelled to the facility by car,but most not further than Yarmouth. Gardening is quite a common hobby amongst the people who were questioned, along with knitting. The Athletics Club and Marina Centre were popular under the Sporting section. People went to the Marina Centre not always for the sporting activities, but sometimes for its other Entertainments.
